Tues, Oct 9, at 1pm PT, 4pm ET #StarTrekHour will discuss TNG S2E8 "A Matter of Honor"
Put discussion questions here: https://t.co/JP0Jpf6NBv https://t.co/E2mRFdiStM
Thanks @crosis42 @Rich_Penney @StorySlug @CheloceanJK @DuckDAWorld @Arbiter_82 @rvkirk @OpsHammond @jurijuri @saintwalker98 @professorwade25 @BuckyWTGoodHair for joining @JoeSondow for #StarTrekHour!
